{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2985495,"name":"Arjun Bhatia","username":"ABhatia","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/90db22/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-01-06T07:07:14.441Z","cooked":"

Share the resources your team uses while you CAD your robot!
Not like your curriculum. More like quick references such as hole tables, material references, workflow guides, etc.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2022-01-06T07:07:14.441Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":36,"reads":172,"readers_count":171,"score":214.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":398755,"topic_slug":"what-resources-do-you-use-while-cading","display_username":"Arjun Bhatia","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://pages.mtu.edu/~suits/misc/tapsizes.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Tap and Clearance Drill Sizes","clicks":21}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":41296,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 7902 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/what-resources-do-you-use-while-cading/398755/1","custom_user_title":"FRC 7902 Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":2985498,"name":"Nick.kremer","username":"Nick.kremer","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nick.kremer/{size}/174932_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-06T07:29:54.763Z","cooked":"

A few I commonly use:

  • CRP Elevator Visualizer
  • Recalc
  • Spectrum Image Gallery
  • NASA RAP Design Guide

Additionally, here are a few graphics I created with Google Drawings:

  • Mastersketch Workflow Hierarchy

FRC_Matersketch_Hierarchy_Final_(1)960×720 48.5 KB

  • FRC CAD File Structure

frc_robot_cad_file_structure960×720 56.1 KB

Thanks for making this thread, I’d love to see what other resources are out there!

I got tired of hunting around in different sources for screw dimensions, so I put this together. Screw Chart.xlsx (17.4 KB)

Use at your own risk, these are just numbers that I’ve copied from various places. (I really need to splurge on a Machinery’s Handbook one of these days…)

There are plenty of older digital versions of The Machinery Handbook hanging around in various places on the internet.

For those who aren’t familiar, this is probably THE reference for most mechanical design applications. This book, alone, taught me more than any class I took at university about design and manufacturing.
